entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 27 April 2023
